title: Publish omengrep to crates.io
description: Publish omengrep to crates.io. Blocked on omendb being published first (currently path dependency). Release pipeline is ready â€” tag v0.1.0 when unblocked.
logs: 2026-02-14: Release pipeline created (release.yml, Homebrew formula). Blocked on omendb crates.io publish.

logs.msg: Sprint 1-4 complete: search quality, token pooling, multi-model, MCP server. Ready for publish after testing full model and MCP integration.

Review+refactor session: fixed query tokenizer bug (embed_query was using doc tokenizer 512 instead of query tokenizer 256), extracted SearchParams struct, deduplicated build_index/result_from_omendb/OutputFormat selection, fixed double subdir cleanup. Simplified to single model (edge only). All 26 tests pass, clippy clean.
Waiting on omendb crates.io publish. Next steps when unblocked: update Cargo.toml dep, cargo publish, tag v0.1.0.

omendb now on crates.io at 0.0.29 (user is maintainer). Bumped dep, fixed multi_vector_with() Result API change (added ? at src/index/mod.rs:581). All 14 tests pass. Waiting on omendb publish to unblock omengrep publish.

Optimization sprint complete (2026-02-23): mtime fast path, nested dedup, BM25 stop-words, boost tuning, build perf. Manifest bumped to v10. omendb 0.0.30 in use. All 26 tests pass. Ready for v0.1.0 tag once omendb is on crates.io.
